name: Volt
description: Volt is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic cat-shaped box, soldier-like arms and legs, and a red and black screen, Volt stands out among its peers. It has a cool and mysterious personality, enhanced by the stylish shades it wears. With its ability to analyze electrical signals and display them in real-time, Volt is an indispensable member of the club.
